pages.text: Once upon a time, in a sun-dappled meadow, lived a little rabbit named Pip. Pip was smaller than all his siblings, but he had the biggest heart.

pages.description: Pip found a treasure chest! Match the pairs of magical items inside.

pages.text: After matching all the treasures, a magical map appeared! It showed the way to the Whispering Woods, a place no rabbit had dared to go before.
